description:
Price Alert
INVEST IN THIS PROPERTY FROM $59 PER WEEK, ASK US HOW!
This 2 bedroom unit at the end of the court must be one of the lowest priced units on the market. This is an ideal investment property. The unit comes with a good size lounge with gas heating, 2 bedrooms, separate bathroom & laundry, meals area and galley kitchen with gas cooking. Outside there is a good back yard with a vegie patch & single carport. The
property is need of a bit of T.L.C this won't last long.

address: Lot 1/27-35 Milne Street Crib Point VIC 3919
description:
Prime Development site !
This 1,207m2 approx 4 unit development site (STCA) is ideal for the both the developer, builder or the owner occupier. The site is situated in a prime location here in Crib Point, only minutes from schools, transport & local shops. This property will not last long. Call Malcolm Parkinson today to arrange your private inspection.

Under Offer
**Click on the video link below to view our video tour**
Immaculate Low Maintenance Gem
Situated in a quiet, leafy, sought after pocket of Crib Point this quality unit is sure to impress all those who inspect. Boasting open plan living and a great courtyard makes this property perfect for first home buyers, investors or older couples downsizing.
Comprising; 2 Bedrooms, 1 Bathroom, open plan kitchen/meals/living, courtyard, single car garage and large front yard, whilst remaining close to Crib Point shops, public transport, Stony Point, and Primary Schools.

Under Offer
Immaculate Presentation In Appealing Location
An outstanding opportunity to enter the property market, downsize in comfort or invest.
This lovely residence features lounge, modern kitchen and adjoining meals area, gas ducted heating and three bedrooms.
Entertain under the large and private rear pergola area looking onto your private, established and landscaped rear yard.
The double raised carport is perfect for boat or caravan storage and drive through into a large lock up garage.
Located close to schools, train station (bus stops) and parks.
Other features include new flooring, new curtains and drapes, 4,000 litre water tank, 2 garden sheds all positioned in the bowl of a quiet court.

So Much For So Little
Families, investors or renovators wishing to extend here's the room to move! Well presented brick veneer home set on a large block of land overlooking farm land at the rear. A good size lounge with dado wall paneling with separate meals area overlooking a modern kitchen with up right gas cooker & dishwasher. Renovated laundry, bathroom & large ensuite with spa bath from the main suite. A good family home which has ducted heating and air conditioning in the lounge. Outside a large colourbond garage shed which has a concrete floor, a long carport which can fit 2 cars & plenty of land for the imagination.
Nigel Evans : 0439 540 055

Sweet & Low
Here's the cottage you've been looking for. Immaculate presentation, 3 bedroom home with bullnose verandah. Walk through the gated arbour and onto the deck which faces north and overlooks the beautiful private garden. A large open plan lounge/dining with high vaulted ceilings overlooks a good size modern kitchen. 3 good size bedrooms, main bathroom & separate laundry. The home is neutral toned throughout with plenty of light. A large split system air-conditioner is situated so the whole house has the benefit of climate changes.
Outside a double carport & garden shed. Why pay rent, suitable for the first home buyer/retired couple or investor looking for a good return. Don't miss this one.
Nigel Evans : 0439 540 055

An Art Deco Delight
This art deco gem is a rare find in Crib Point. With polished boards, art deco features throughout and an outdoor area made for entertaining makes this home well suited to young couples, first home buyers, professionals, small families and anyone after a place to home with a unique style. Comprising: three bedrooms, lounge, central bathroom, open plan kitchen & meals, laundry, rear deck, lush garden, a double carport evaporative cooling and gas ducted heating. Close to local shops, all forms of public transport, parklands, Crib Point Primary School and only minutes drive to the area's leading beaches and wineries.

A Huge Lush 1500m2 Allotment!
**Click on the video link below to view our video tour**
This huge block with a charming original home is sure to impress all who inspect. With great scope for future improvement while being instantly comfortable makes this home well suited to all couples, families, developers and anyone after a rare size block in a sought after location. The house itself has an inviting feel with a sundrenched living zone and fully renovated kitchen. Close to all that this fantastic area has to offer and just a short drive to some of the area's finest beaches. Inspection a must!
Zoned Residential 1, the 1500m2 property has the added advantage of allowing subdivision (STCA), providing new owners the option of re-invigorating the existing home or starting from scratch with vacant parcels.

Under Offer!! Quality location.....Leafy location!!
This leafy three bedroom property features large open plan kitchen/meals and lounge area with coonara and air con. The master is complete with ensuite and walk in robe and the main bathroom has a spa bath.
Outside is a covered entertaining area, large shed with access down the side of the house and double lock up garage with internal access.
This property would make a great family home or for the astute investor who wants to get involved in growing Crib Point.

STREET APPEALLING HOME SET ON A QUIET COUNTRY LANE
This very private 3 B/R B/V home on a large 1/4 block is located in a highly sought after area. The street appealing home boast three spacious bedrooms, revamped bathroom, new carpets and freshly painted throughout. The galley style kitchen overlooks a very large paved outdoor entertaining area that is fully enclosed so you can enjoy entertaining your guest in privacy. This area also can be accessed from the meals area. The lounge/ meals area also adjoins the kitchen. Nestled down the back of this very large block of over 1000sqmts is a colour bond workshop which has power and concrete. Also is a two storey cubby house for the kids to enjoy. The high double carport allows good clearance for access to the rear of the yard for those looking to secure a boat or caravan. A Must See! Call Wilma Green to arrange for a viewing on 0407 833 996.

Under Offer!! 1200m2 opportunity that ticks all the boxes!!
Look no further! This 1200m2 approx. allotment with existing 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom Western Red Cedar home is the ideal development/investment opportunity. Located at the end of a quiet Court with no through traffic & close to local shops, train station, bus stop, parks & schools this potential multi-unit property (STCA) ticks all the boxes.
The cottage style home features large master with BIR's, floating floor boards, open kitchen/living, separate laundry, Gas heating, Coonara & A/C while outside a covered rear decked entertaining area complete with spa & large 4-6 car garage connected to power & water completes the package. Oozing development potential this property will sell quickly.
Inspection as advertised or by appointment.

Rental Meets Price
What an ideal investment to start your portfolio or buy to live. This as new brick veneer unit still under builders warranty comes with its own single carport. Inside you will find a large main bedroom with walk in robe and dual access bathroom, a decent size lounge/dining area that overlooks the modern kitchen which has ample cupboard space & stainless steel appliances. A separate laundry leads to the rear garden with a paved patio ideal for the barbeque. Fully fenced for privacy & storage area for your tools. The home has the comfort of reverse cycle air conditioning and is located within walking distance to local schools/shops & recreational facilities. The property is currently leased until February 2012 returning $230.00 per week with a good tenant wishing to stay on.
Nigel Evans : 0439 540 055

QUARTER ACRE BLOCK, make an offer!
Beautifully treed & pretty, quarter acre allotment. Half way between shopping centre & station, in a single dwelling area. Never been built on. What more can we say? First time offered in 20 years. Contact Kerry-Lee Marshall 0408 363 686 Vendor is very motivated

Under Contract - SOLD
Live in and enjoy... or develop and prosper.
Perfect for a dual occupancy this 'as new' home, in one of Crib Point's best courts will sell quickly.
A 3 bedroom home with 2 living areas is positioned to the front, right hand side of the block.
Features include a master with ensuite, double carport under the roofline of the home, ducted heating and evaporative cooling.
A covered entertaining area is positioned to the rear of the home and a lovely garden stretches to the rear fence.
For further information or an inspection of the site please contact Jason Dowler on 0403 598 754 anytime.

Near NEW 3 bedroom!
This large three bedroom unit is perfect for the wise investor or would also make a lovely home for those looking to move into a peaceful location overlooking Woolleys beach foreshore reserve and at the rear of a small block.
Positioned on a large allotment, main with ensuite and walk in robe, two further bedrooms with built in robes and serviced by a large family bathroom. With a spacious open plan lounge and dining area and kitchen comprising of breakfast bar, dishwasher, gas stainless steel appliances.
The outside complements this great home with a large private rear yard, garden shed and a double lock up garage with internal access and remote control door!
This property is only 1 year young and is covered under the builders structural warranty, for your buying peace of mind and is currently leased returning $1,300 per calendar month with the lease expiring March 2012.
Located within walking distance to the bus and train station, shops including grocery store, post office, hairdresser and café, what more could you ask for?

address: 399 Stony Point Road Crib Point VIC 3919
description:
UNDER OFFER!
Set in this great location & within walking distance to shops, schools & transport this cottage style residence is ideal for a first home owner, renovator or a great opportunity to build your dream home! This property includes 2 substantial bedrooms, large central lounge room with gas wall heater, kitchen with gas cooking & meals area. Main bathroom with separate WC & laundry, floor boards throughout with the potential to renovate & make this blank canvass come to life! With plenty of room outside & scope for change, properties at this price do not come along very often. Call Tim Hughes today to arrange your private inspection.

Under Contract - Jason Dowler 0403 598 754
Hidden behind a high fence is this very private three bedroom home with picturesque surrounds of established trees all set on large 686m2 (approx) and featuring new carpet, an updated central family bathroom with bath and separate toilet, gas heating and high vaulted ceilings creating that feeling of space.
Located on a corner block with side access perfect for a boat, caravan or trailer with a large carport and lock up garage. The boating enthusiasts will also appreciate the close proximity to the Stony Point launching ramp whilst the local primary school, public transport, nature parks and shops offers every amenity at your doorstep.
Offering exceptional value for money this property won't last!
Be quick to book an inspection and avoid missing out, call Jason Dowler 0403 598 754 or Lauren Dunsford 0422 385 869.

Prime Development site !
This 1,214m2 approx multi-unit development site is ideal for the both the developer, builder or the owner occupier. The site is situated in a prime location here in Crib Point, only minutes from schools, transport & local shops. This property will not last long. Call Malcolm Parkinson on 0421 704 246 today to arrange your private inspection.

Under Instruction From State Trustees - Priced To Sell! $279,000.00
An exceptional opportunity to secure this superb multi unit development site (STCA) moments from the station, shops, pre school and across the road from the HMAS Cerberus naval base. Set on more than 1200sqm and with two street frontages, there are numerous design options for maximising the number of dwellings and private open space areas on the site.
Strong demand for rental accommodation also exists for housing close to the train line and there is potential to explore leasing options with the Defence Housing Authority.
With only an original 1920s fisherman's cottage on the site, call your architect and builder and get started on this exciting project right in the heart of Crib Point and moments from the Stony Point ferry and boat ramp.
Emil Foller : 0403 301 097

UNDER OFFER!
Positioned for complete convenience is this modern, four-bedroom home in peaceful cul-de-sac seclusion only minutes from Morradoo and Crib Point train stations.
Here contemporary living is easily achieved with an impressive free-flowing floorplan, two separate living areas, master-to-ensuite, central bathroom, laundry facilities, walk-in robes to every bedroom and a stylish kitchen adding feature lighting, Blanco cooking appliances, huge pantry plus breakfast bench.
Further luxury is found outside with covered alfresco entertaining complimented by drought-tolerant plantings, a Balinese hut and bubbling five-seat outdoor spa.
The generous, near-level 1044m2 allotment (approx.) zoned R1Z for possible subdivision (S.T.C.A) includes a free-standing lock-up garage, animal enclosure, secure front fencing, large lawn areas and double remote garaging.
Boating enthusiasts will appreciate the close proximity to Hans Inlet and Westernport Bay whilst the local primary school, nature parks and nearby town shopping offers every amenity at your doorstep.

UNDER OFFER!
Less than 200 metres from Morradoo Train Station is this four-bedroom home set on an expansive ¼ acre allotment (approx.) in the coastal community of Crib Point.
Retaining original features the dwelling comprises a functional kitchen/servery, full central bathroom, ensuite facilities, open lounge/dining, built-in robes, timber flooring, airconditioning and toasty Coonara heating.
Positioned behind secure front fencing with handy dual access the property includes plenty of shedding, outdoor entertaining and a handy tandem carport to accommodate the vehicles.
Surrounded by native gums, birdlife and an ever-peaceful atmosphere this seaside location is near to all amenities including local shops, parklands, schools and HMAS Cerberus.
This is an affordable entry-level home or relaxing holiday retreat offering comfortable living now or exciting refurbishment potential in the future.
